website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Max Thea SE is undeniably stylish which can be bought without breaking an arm and leg. It is loved by heaps of users as it goes well with lots of casual wear. It doesn’t scrimp on comfort since the proprietary Air bubble in the sole shields the feet from impact.The common setback presented by many is it comes with a narrow width which can get a bit cramp if you go for a true to size. Going for a half size higher is recommended by most.
pros: As affirmed by reviewers, the Nike Air Max Thea SE with a Phylon-made midsole is lightweight
Its shimmery cover offers a nice contrast to a pair of jeans, as told by many
A large number of users loved the Rose Gold colorway as it puts a feminine tone to their casual wear without being too flashy
Reviewers find this sneaker perfect for everyday use
A well-structured sneaker built with a leather upper and support on the heel region
As declared by many, it’s a comfortable pair of sneakers built with the Air-sole cushioning unit
This Special Edition of the Air Max Thea provides an awesome fit after breaking-in for a week
So easy to match with a wide range of wardrobe as this Air Max Thea version can be dressed up or down
Money is well spent on the Air Max Thea SE as mentioned by many
Users got lots of compliments while wearing this low-top Nike Air Max Thea SE as its cover is done with the right amount of shimmer without being too glittery
cons: A narrow-footed reviewer said this Air Max Thea variety looks great, but the sizing option is very small and tight
One reviewer mentioned the back of the heel caused blisters
Less than a handful of reviewers said the upper is stiff and hard as plastic, and quite snug around the top of the foot which they find unpleasant
Few reviewers noticed that the upper creases easily towards the forefoot

customer_reviews.title: nice, but 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: these are the only nikes that are not true to size. i had to return them ( i have a few air max theas and these are very small). my other Theas are size 7 and so i got these in a 7 and they are too small. need to go up 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Love the Metallic Hematite Gray
customer_reviews.text: Love the metallic hematite color--glad I read the reviews. Ordered a half size up and they fit perfect. The metallic is subtle and a great dark gray. Very cute/cool.
customer_reviews.author: PMichelleD

customer_reviews.title: really cute sneaker but
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is way too narrow and I have narrow feet but the sneaker is stylish looking.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and color of this shoe. Does run a little small. About half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Exactly as pictured. I ordered a size up from what I normal wear in nikes so they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy

customer_reviews.title: I really like them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I read other comments which said they ran small. I bought half a size bigger and fit perfectly. In the picture they look dark, a metallic black. They are really metallic gray with a deep blue undertone, which I didn't really like when I opened the box, but after the first initial surprise, I really like them now!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with the Nike Woman"s Air Max Thea Metallic Silver
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the Nike Woman"s Air Max Thea Metallic Silver. The fit was too narrow, not like previous shoes that I have had. I returned the shoes to Amazon before Christmas. As yet I have not received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit stiff but overall comfortable and look nice. Not super padded but good for errands etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn nike shoes and currently have 10 pairs in my closet. THESE ARE WAY TOO TIGHT! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bz

customer_reviews.title: These were pretty uncomfortable. I sent my first pair back for ...
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty uncomfortable. I sent my first pair back for a larger size and and they still felt small. They look nice, but I wouldn't want to walk around in them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Not so cute after wearing them once. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Not so cute after wearing them once. They get creases cause of the leather material & SO uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments every time I wear these! They are Rose Gold, and I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Court D

customer_reviews.title: Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneakers, but small. I am always 6 in all shoes, but for this one I’d order 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: Andreina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and tight. Not flexible at all. Cute shoe but not made to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M. Melancon

customer_reviews.title: They're beautiful and so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They're beautiful and so comfortable. We did order up a half size . Had we ordered the actual size it wouldn't have fit.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl eulau

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recieved them very quickly, seem to run a 1/2 size small.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE SHOE WAS EXACTLY WHAT WE WANTED THEY JUST RAN SMALL
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D Brawley

customer_reviews.title: In the picture looks like a metallic black
customer_reviews.text: In the picture looks like a metallic black, but is more like a metallic grey in person. Totally not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: catafreer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but looks like it's been worn
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes looks like it has been worn, dirty bottom, creases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The front has some weird marks, and it is a little smaller than expected. I should have returned them
customer_reviews.author: 3D B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the large is ok, but I found this a little bit narrow
customer_reviews.author: Jannin Cabrices

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Definitely go one size up. I am usually a size 6 but ordered a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mcbean

product_meta.title: Nike Women's 861674-002 Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Original and exklusive sport products by Nike
